promo.title: 20% OFF for Keratin Hair Spa Treatment packages for 1st-time Customers (worth $480)
promo.description: This Keratin - based treatment seeks to leave your hair looking smooth, straighter and more manageable. Sign up as our new customers and enjoy this promotion.

terms.point: For first-time customers aged 18 and above only.
Only be redeemed at Raffles Place outlet only.
This deal cannot be used in conjunction with other promotions and discounts.
